ul.p: About the game (Pond Abyss*):

ul.li: Description: Pond Abyss is a first-person psychological horror game with a length of 25-30 minutes. The action takes place on a secluded forest pond, where the protagonist is tasked with looking after it while his uncle is away. However, the once peaceful atmosphere soon becomes unsettling when eerie and inexplicable events begin to unfold.
